# `syncImsCredentials()`

```ts
function syncImsCredentials(): Promise<void>;
```

Defined in: [env.ts:113](https://github.com/adobe/aio-commerce-sdk/blob/24de65f0066c2a72e7dbcf59dd146ea501386562/packages-private/scripting-utils/source/env.ts#L113)

Syncs the IMS credentials environment variables from the configured IMS context in
the .env file, in a way that is compatible with `@adobe/aio-commerce-lib-auth`

## Returns

`Promise`\<`void`\>
